disease: Chlamydial infection of anus and rectum

symptoms.name: Proctocolitis (in LGV)
symptoms.pattern: Associated with Lymphogranuloma venereum (LGV) caused by biovars L1, L2, or L3

physical_findings: Tender inguinal or femoral lymphadenopathy (in LGV)

Nucleic acid amplification tests (NAATs).abnormal_range: Positive result indicates infection, but does not distinguish between live and dead bacteria

risk_factors: Men who have sex with men (MSM)

required: Positive NAAT or culture for Chlamydia trachomatis in rectal sample
